title: Veiger Remake - I demand an explanation
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cn-A8NzCqgc

The fuck is this Riot? Making his Q a skill shot, his E having a delay, and his R damage nerfed?

You already removed one of his core items.

Now you're butchering his essential skills? Are you kidding me?

Might as well make Ashe charge her Volley and do fixed magic damage, since you seem to love neglecting and even shoving aside older classic champions.

Now I definitely want to throw away Final Villain skin.

............./´¯/)........... (\¯`\ 
............/....//........... ...\\....\ 
.........../....//............ ....\\....\ 
...../´¯/..../´¯\.........../¯ `\....\¯`\ 
.././.../..../..../.|_......_| .\....\....\...\.\.. 
(.(....(....(..../.)..)..(..(. \....)....)....).) 
.\................\/.../....\. ..\/................/ 
..\................. /........\................../ 
....\..............(.......... ..)................/ 
......\.............\......... ../............./


Kindly go fuck yourself, Balance Team.

replies.body: This why you will never ever see a RED post on the boards because we have little 12 year old kids running around screaming "Fuck you Riot"  because their favorite champion is getting nerfed and can't even post a logical argument.

Oh look another ass kisser of the Reds. Let's watch as he cries about how anyone that dares goes against the almighty Reds are beneath him.

The Reds are a joke in all honesty.
I sense a little 12 year old boy right here. I have a feeling its past your bed time little boy. don't want your parents to get mad at you now. Right?
You sure love to talk about 12 year olds, huh?
A perfect example of how unproductive these boards are :(
meh. there was worse on old GD

Old GD stopped trying to be productive like mid S2. It was never about League, GD was all about trying to out-shitpost one another intertwined with actual discussions that got drowned in all the shitposting. It was fun when you stopped caring.

But beyond that, people need to stop whining about every change and see this change will probably only Make Veigar stronger, if anything. As a once favorite champion says often, "*Change, is good.*"

Dude, I think you need a nap. Or a bottle. Or burped. 

Riot posted their reasoning behind the veigar changes and I think they put him in a healthier and more buffable place.

First of all, Reds made a mistake by telling us about compensation buffs instead of a rework. 

Second, they made changes that initially made a champion worse than he was and told us he probably will get buffed because he is now way more healthy. Problem is that if you know champion will need buffs and he will be really unpopular and weak you didn't do a good job. 

I really want them to do "something" to back up their decisions aside of telling us "if he will be weak we will buff him". This is pretty lazy effort if you ask me.

I want them to keep stun delay and work Veigar viability around it. If they can't to that, that means boards are right. And we don't want LoL boards to be smarter than Riot Balance team. 

Would suck to be worse at balancing a champion than 12 yo boys, right?

"Healthier place" In a lane dominated by mobile assassins, do you REALLY feel that Veigar is going to be able to anything? 

{{champion:238}} - W out of stun

{{champion:91}} - E out of stun

{{champion:7}} - W OR R out of stun

{{champion:157}} - E out of stun AND Block everything while he's at it

{{champion:55}} - E out of stun

{{champion:38}} - R out of stun

{{champion:131}} - R onto you and completely rape you 

The list goes on really. He's SUPER squishy, and let's not forget about every other role that can very easily jump out of your stun. Not only do most of these people literally force you to build against them, but they delay your power spike. **Hard.**
And of course, these champions that counter him now, are the easiest champions to towerdive with. So R.I.P Veigar. He stands no chance of protecting himself, and self peel.
How is any of that any different than the current situation? They all already dumpster him in an even skill matchup and they have for years.
Then why would you want Veigar nerfed. Whereas these match ups were already difficult, they are even harder now.
Exactly. Its my favorite champion too. That doesn't mean you should act like an entitled brat.

I seem to not understand what you are referring to but I'll try to show some explanation. I'm just tired of people spamming boards demanding a response from Riot while simultaneously insulting them and calling them stupid for their reasons to change things. Calling them retards doesn't make them want to reply because the problem will most likely escalate to more name calling and arguments if they respond.

I didn't mean you were a brat. I more meant that OP is. I agreed with your post.

I spoke poorly. Its been a long day. :D

Honestly I think the entire  rework is fine except for the e. As a frequent veigar player, without an instant stun, you will get exploded against zed/lb and the other midlaners with any sort of dash. The pitiful extra range is not enough to make up for the loss in catching potential either.
Though, you could say since his Q has a longer range and can hit up to 2 minions, he doesn't need to get close to Zeds and Leblancs in lane anymore. It does give him some safety in lane.

> [{quoted}](name=TheTyeGuy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4e3qvEAR,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-02-19T00:55:26.319+0000)
>
> Though, you could say since his Q has a longer range and can hit up to 2 minions, he doesn't need to get close to Zeds and Leblancs in lane anymore. It does give him some safety in lane.

The amount if minions is the same. You can't achieve more CS with new Q.
More range = less likely to get zoned. = less likely to miss Cs.
You achieve it much faster though. Which isn't a guess, it's what was happening on the test server and is why they lowered the ult ratio. You also miss less Q-farm early before you have decent CDR.
If a Zed can still wreck a Xerath, he can still wreck a wannabe Xerath.
Why would Zed beat xerath ?
cause he can teleport past the stuns and skillshots to stab him to death. When played well Zed can do that.
I would argue that is much more a skill matchup as xerath has to time his stun for the most opportune situation.

I can see that interpretation. My only sticking point is that Zed's high skill ceiling makes it easier for him to toy with Xerath. Technically speaking Zed never needs to get hit by xerath stun.
With enough reaction time (Theoretically )Zed can see the stun, shadow past it, teleport to shadow before stun hits him, and be closer to xerath and ready to punish the failed stun.

It involves a lot of mind games and cooldown timings. If zed blows his shadow on failed harassment or stupid styling, then xerath will incinerate him, so I can see where you are coming from.

Zed just has that **potential**. Its why he is seen so often at higher levels historically.

Okay, Zed being OP as fuck no matter who is laning against him has nothing to do with Veigar in particular. At worst this will increase Zed's winrate to pickrate ratio and *force Riot to actually fucking nerf Zed.* This is a good thing.

Plus, a lot of low-elo Zed's don't have a clue what they're doing. Also, Veigar's Q range is now almost as high as an Urgot Q, so unless the Zed is standing under Veigar's tower before he starts using his teleport combo, Veigar ought to have time to drop his E on top of Zed's shadow.

Oh, I meant to be speaking specifically to the Xerath Zed matchup.

Veigar X Zed is gonna be the shit show it always was. Veigar will be fighting to lose lane slowly, but thats ok. Thats kinda veigar's thing.

i dont understand why he had the nerfs
like really Viegar is a SINGLE TARGET mage
he has no mobility and not much of a defense stats
the delay nerf on his E is a HUGE problem because that his ONLY engage or escape
the instant stun allow him to walk in, burst, then walk out
but if they are able to see the stun they can just wait in the middle or flash out and since Q is now a skill shot it will be almost impossible to land all three ablilities! how the hell im i gonna burst someone if i cant even stun them so i can land the abilities?
im pissed because i got the final boss Veigar skin and now  i wont be playing him much because of this
They flash out to not be stunned. they now have a 5 minute timer, you have an 18 second timer. Try again.

im not saying that they have to use a flash
im saying that  if you have a fast enough reaction you could just avoid walking into Veigar's  E
like if i was against a Katarina and the player has really good reflexes he can just hop onto another minion to get out of the stuns range.
This makes veigar very weak against assassins  like leblanc and fizz because he cant hold down these champs anymore and i already cant deal with fizz's dodging ability

Ok. If they play katarina, you still have the same problem as before. Previously, if you don't manage to clip her, she'll jump out anyway.  Now, you have to actually work with your team to set up the 4 man stun and delete kat. Or, you can still just hit her with your ult. His ult, along with the new burst item, is pretty much the same amount of damage as it was previously.   Oh, and you can now poke the backline as well because your skillshot penetrates the front line. 

Besides, if they pick Kat first, why the hell would you pick veigar?
Yeah I agree with you on that I though his Q was gonna be like Mfs Q but its like so bad and the delay on his E is a huge nerf imo. Viegar had one job 100-0 people and riot took that away from him.
His Q is more like a Lux snare than an MF Q.

Really sickening to see people try to kiss up to Riot's Balance Team in this obvious nerf of Veigar, who didn't deserve it in the first place. So many other champions that need a rework (URGOT) And they choose the one that was just fine and fucked it all up.

The people complaining have not played him on pbe :/

Same thing happened with Ahri...

Simple fact is right now he can easily gain 300+ AP with just a morello's by 15 minutes if you last hit properly. That is crazy.

I do not deny that his E should have a slow or something in the middle, but saying this is a nerf, when literally all of his abilities gained reduced mana costs, ranged, cast times, cooldowns, etc, and then saying this is a nerf is just uneducated. You can literally q farm just as well as an Annie right now. Thats insane.

From what i have seen, if you stack properly, you dont even need to land w on squishy targets to 1 shot them. You dont even need to land the stun!

All you need is to land q and r, and they will die depending on your target.

Not to mention that his q being a skillshot, and gaining range also increases his options in lane. You can actually stack while harassing at the same time.

Also, the cage, and reduced fall time for W is a HUGE buff to teamfights. A good cage will win you a fight. Your enemy will be forced to stand in the center if you aim properly, meaning that if you crowd 3-4 people inside of that cage, it is an aoe fighter's wet dream.

Lock everyone in cage, release the fiddle-sticks, profit.

The only thing that should be done is A: Increasing the ult scaling to 1:1 instead of 1:0, OR, adding a slow to targets trapped inside of the cage

> [{quoted}](name=Cameron2325,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4e3qvEAR,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-02-19T02:13:35.288+0000)

> Also, the cage, and reduced fall time for W is a HUGE buff to teamfights. A good cage will win you a fight. Your enemy will be forced to stand in the center if you aim properly, meaning that if you crowd 3-4 people inside of that cage, it is an aoe fighter's wet dream.

They didn't reduce the fall time of his W though...

>Simple fact is right now he can easily gain 300+ AP with just a morello's by 15 minutes if you last hit properly. That is crazy.

he could do that before and didn't shove his lane nearly as hard as he does on the PBE 

>I do not deny that his E should have a slow or something in the middle, but saying this is a nerf, when literally all of his abilities gained >reduced mana costs, ranged, cast times, cooldowns, etc, and then saying this is a nerf is just uneducated. You can literally q farm just >as well as an Annie right now. Thats insane.

his Q has a higher cooldown later in the game and its mana cost didn't change. Veigar stopped having mana problems by 20 minutes anyway.

he got some minor buffs to "compensate" (i'm noticing a theme here) for his only reliable form of CC to become delayed enough that anyone can walk out of it without boots. god forbid you go up against anyone who has a dash because they'll spam laugh while you get bent over

>Also, the cage, and reduced fall time for W is a HUGE buff to teamfights. A good cage will win you a fight. Your enemy will be forced to >stand in the center if you aim properly, meaning that if you crowd 3-4 people inside of that cage, it is an aoe fighter's wet dream.

this already happened, but you didn't have the time to just walk out of his box and disengage/counter-engage on him. you had to guess where he was going to drop his stun and play around it (which is actual counterplay, not being given a wacky sound effect and some flashing lights to tell you you're in danger) 

Oh, and W didn't get a reduced fall time, or it wasn't mentioned at all. it got a lower cooldown and a slightly lower mana cost at later levels

>The only thing that should be done is A: Increasing the ult scaling to 1:1 instead of 1:0, OR, adding a slow to targets trapped inside of >the cage

what should be done is for Veigar to be given more durability at the cost of his reliability. making someone a hyper-squishy champion who's already painfully slow and now can't even outplay you with his E isn't good nor fair design. and frankly, neither is the fact that he has a dedicated Mage-Be-Gone button loaded into his ultimate. if you want a fair power distribution, remove some from his ult stealing enemy AP and put it into its natural scaling. but the E change is not cool at all, it makes him unfairly susceptible to mobility and assassins. it's gone from "okay I should bait his stun because it'll come up faster than I can burst him" to "I can easily kill Veigar, his stun won't come up fast enough to stop me."

quick edit: i'd like to note I think his Q is way more fun as a skillshot and it'll probably be a huge boon to his laning, but his E should be left alone considering how many ways you can counter it; or at, the very least, the delay be slightly reduced

>he could do that before and didn't shove his lane nearly as hard as he does on the PBE.

Dude, veigar couldn't reach that high that quick. He can do 200 AP by 15 minutes if he is killing folks left and right, but the truth is that Q's cooldown is just too long to farm that quick. 
He now has a lower Q cooldown, AND can kill 2 minions with each Q. That is insane.

his Q has a higher cooldown at later levels and he could farm just fine with a rush on mana regen. I could kill most of the wave with a forbidden idol and double doran's, the new Q only lets me do it from farther away (sometimes)

He's also shoving his lane hard to kill 2 minions at the same time which makes him extremely vulnerable to ganks, not to mention giving up harass in favor of a passive that you have to spend a long time farming to get noticeable gains out of

So what? thats exactly the way he was before the changes. He can better farm with a longer range Q.
**
Veigar can't harass, is vulnerable to ganks, and needs to farm a lot? Say it aint so!**
These are all core traits of his. The fact that his farming got better just helps mellow out the ugliest aspects of that weak early game.

>his Q has a higher cooldown at later levels and he could farm just fine with a rush on mana regen.

You **think** you could farm just fine. The lower cooldown at lower levels is a direct function to higher mid and late game AP. You could farm fine for the Q you had. The new Q can farm harder faster and better.

You can point out it has a (1 second) higher cooldown at max level, but since it can still kill 2 minions it can still farm faster than old Q, its lower cooldown at early levels is gonna help more than a higher lategame will hurt.

Oh yeah, and Q can now hit 2 champions, effectively doubling its per cast damage if you are good. Lining up the Q isn't that hard when you boxed 3 champs inside your stun cage with minimal room to run. Trapped inside Event Horizon with little room to run is just the place for the new Q to work well.

>the new Q only lets me do it from farther away (sometimes)
Further away, and two at a time, and allows you to resist zoning by still farming 1 at a time when losing lane (because Veigar is going to lose lane. He is going to. This is a fact if your opponent is competent.)
I still need an explanation on why his R is nerfed out of the blue.

Really good, well-though and constructive arguments.

Edit : /s just in case.
I played as and against the new Veigar on PBE. This is a nerf, and a big one at that. The cage can't have a delay. I don't care about the Q or the Ult nerfs, just revert the changes on cage.

It is still almost as strong for escaping ganks (barring edge cases) and while it is weaker in teamfights, veigar has much more AP now and was always better off comboing his stun off of another initiation anyway. Also, hitting 2 champs with Q effectively doubles its damage and scaling. Also dark matter got a 20% cooldown buff.

While you are right about the Q, keep in mind that it is a skillshot and as such can be bodyblocked and dodged. Now that I think about it, maybe the cage should cost more mana to keep it in line if it had no delay. It really is too strong but it's in a weird spot of balance. Dark Matter needed the CD buff, since it was only useful for waveclear to begin with.

Dark Matter needed the buff indeed. Its probably Veigar's funniest spell. I love dropping rocks.

As for the Q,

>keep in mind that it is a skillshot and as such can be bodyblocked and dodged

Dodged I will give you, it is quite dodgable now, but its penetration makes it just enough of a pain in the ass to bodyblock. To stop a squishy marksman or mage from eating it would require 2 separate things bodyblocking it.
Im just excited about the idea of catching a tank and a squishy in the E ring, then Qing to hit both of them, cause 1 tank can't stop the hit. :D

I don't think Veigar will be top tier after this, but I just think the increased earlygame farming range will be enough to make him a little more playable.

> [{quoted}](name=LockeTheHunter,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4e3qvEAR,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-02-19T03:39:57.979+0000)
>
> I played as and against the new Veigar on PBE. This is a nerf, and a big one at that. The cage can't have a delay. I don't care about the Q or the Ult nerfs, just revert the changes on cage.

The cage is needed, it was just dumb how he could insta stun someone at the range he had. Thank god this change is going through.

-Can't spell his name right
-Calls the skin Final Villain instead of Final Boss

-doesn't use apostrophes, yet calls someone else out on incorrect spelling

EDIT: Nice edit.  We all know your hypocrisy.
